suncertify.remote
Interface RemoteDBAccessFactory

All Superinterfaces:
java.rmi.Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
RemoteDBAccessFactoryImpl
public interface RemoteDBAccessFactory
extends java.rmi.Remote

Interface of components that can create instances implementing the RemoteDBAccess interface.

Field Summary
static java.lang.String RMI_KEY
          Key used to bind an instance in an RMI registry.
 
Method Summary

          Creates a new instance implementing RemoteDBAccess.
